citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process
at 9:55 am on 04/25/2016. Inspector knocked and rang the doorbell several times. Attempted to make contact with
the licensee by phone and message was left. A business card was left on the front door. Inspector departed the
facility at 10:26 am.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
Section 2.126(b) A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process
at 9:55 am on 04/25/2016.  Inspector knocked and rang the doorbell several times. Attempted to make contact with
the licensee by phone and message was left.  A business card was left on the front door.  Inspector departed the
facility at 10:26 am.
